html:
The Book of Mormon retains the phrase "for they shall perish" in place of "it shall be ill with him," much of which was italicized by the King James translators.

Woe unto the wicked! it shall be ill with him: for the reward of his hands shall be given him. (Isaiah 3:11.)

We unto the wicked, for they shall perish; for the reward of their hands shall be upon them! (2 Ne. 13:11.)

The sterner punishment is more consistent with other scriptures regarding the destruction of the wicked at the Second Coming (see, for example, D&C 101:23-24).
